attributes.action: explain how foreign vehicles will be charged a congestion charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to know how foreign cars and HGVs will be charged to use british roads. Unless a satellite tracking system is installed, how will congestion charges be meaasured in a foreign vehicle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
